thread.section_title: Ibis Styles Paris Massena Olympiades - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful breakfast - Review
thread.title_full: Wonderful breakfast - Review of Ibis Styles Paris Massena Olympiades, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kwnike13
title: Wonderful breakfast - Review
text:
The rooms are cozy and clean with a tv and free wifi. They are the typical small, European style room. It is very secure and a quick 4 minute walk to the metro and a 25 minute ride to all the attractions. You can't beat it for the price here!
The complimentary breakfast is also wonderful. The fresh croissants and baguettes with the ham and cheese is just a wonderful start to the day. They also have many different types of coffee, fresh juice, cereal, fruit and other delicious pastries to please any pallette.
